summary: Rodney "Norvell" Stuckey is a professional National Basketball Association player for the, Detroit Pistons.
full_text: Rodney Norvell Stuckey  is an American professional basketball player who currently plays for the Indiana Pacers of the National Basketball Association . He previously played 7 seasons for the Detroit Pistons and played college basketball for Eastern Washington University.
title: Rodney Stuckey
